ARABIC: يَٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ ٱسْمُهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ لَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ سَمِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Zakariyya! We give you the good news of a boy named Yahya, a name We have given to no one else before.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Zachariah," (it was) said, "We give you good news of a son by name of John.' To none have We attributed the name before."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (He was told): "Zechariah, We bring you the good news of the birth of a son whose name shall be Yahya (John), one whose namesake We never created before."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We answered his prayers with the glad news of the birth of a son by the name of John and told him, "We have never given such a name to anyone else."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O Zakaria! We give you the glad tidings of a son whose name is Yahya (John) – before him, We have not created anyone of this name.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah said:) "O Zakariyya! Verily, We give you the good news of a son, whose name will be Yahya. We have given that name to none before (him)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O Zakariya! surely We give you good news of a boy whose name shall be Yahya: We have not made before anyone his equal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O Zachariah, We give thee good tidings of a boy, whose name is John. No namesake have We given him aforetime.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (It was said unto him): O Zachariah! Lo! We bring thee tidings of a son whose name is John; we have given the same name to none before (him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Zachariah, We bring you good news of a son whose name shall be John. We have not given such a name to anyone before."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Zakariyya! verily We give thee the glad tidings of a boy: his name shall be Yahya; We have not afore-time made his namesake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘O Zechariah! Indeed We give you the good news of a son, whose name is ‘‘John.’’ Never before have We made anyone his namesake.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (His prayer was answered): "O Zakariya! We give thee good news of a son: His name shall be Yahya: on none by that name have We conferred distinction before."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah said) "O Zakariya (Zachariah)! Verily, We give you the glad tidings of a son, His name will be Yahya (John). We have given that name to none before (him)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O Zachariah, We give you good tidings of a son, and he shall be called John (Yahya); a name We have never given before'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “O Zechariah, We give you good news of a son, whose name is John, a name We have never given before.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John. We have not assigned to any before [this] name."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:7] God, exalted be He, in responding to his request for a son that will be the incarnation of His mercy, says: ‘O Zachariah! Indeed We give you good tidings of a boy, who will inherit in the way that you have requested — whose name is John. Never before have We made anyone his namesake’, that is, [never has there been] anyone with the name ‘John’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And so Gabriel called him, saying: (0 Zachariah! Lo! We bring you tidings of a son whose name is John) Yahya in Arabic, because he has breathed life (ahya) into his mother's womb; (We have given the same name to none before (him)) We have not given before a son to Zachariah whose name is John; it is also said that this means: there was no one before him whose name was John.
